title: 刚开了服，地皮不要钱就能领怎么办
txt_content: 求大神指点，怎么配置才能收费，请留下配置详解，有图最好

replies.author: 网络摆渡客
replies.txt_content:
economy:
      UseEconomy: true    //开启经济支持
      CanPutOnSale: true
      CanSellToBank: true
      RefundClaimPriceOnReset: false
      RefundClaimPriceOnSetOwner: false
      ClaimPrice: 1000.0    //这个是领取地皮的价格
      ClearPrice: 2000.0
      AddPlayerPrice: 100.0
      DenyPlayerPrice: 100.0
      RemovePlayerPrice: 0.0
      UndenyPlayerPrice: 0.0
      PlotHomePrice: 0.0
      CanCustomizeSellPrice: true
      SellToPlayerPrice: 10000.0
      SellToBankPrice: 6000.0
      BuyFromBankPrice: 10000.0
      AddCommentPrice: 0.0
      BiomeChangePrice: 0.0
      ProtectPrice: 0.0
      DisposePrice: 0.0复制代码
